FuncDef: This command configures a percentage-based or number-based threshold which represents the minimal available percentage or number of the prefix with a configured length in the provisioned prefix. The system will send out a warning if the actual percentage or number is lower than the configured threshold.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the percentage of used prefixes with the minimum free threshold length in the pool compared to the number of provisioned prefixes. Values-0 to 100.
Specifies the number of prefixes. Values-0 to 4294967295.
